definition: to lump together/to treat along with all the others
to be complicated by/to erupt simultaneously
to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)

sentences.english: I was busy but miserable at twenty.
sentences.chinese: 我的二十歲是繁忙併且痛苦的。

sentences.english: It may survive and give rise to two mononucleate hybrid cells called synkaryons .
sentences.chinese: 可存活併產生兩個稱爲合核體的單核的雜種細胞。

sentences.english: Early one morning, Shmi was attacked and abducted by the savage Tusken Raiders.
sentences.chinese: 一天清晨，野蠻的塔斯肯襲擊者毆打併綁架了施密。

sentences.english: The proposal has "validated" and "legitimated" the city today, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，提案於今日生效併合法化。

sentences.english: At present our company is mainly engaged in grid-connected system and off-grid system.
sentences.chinese: 目前我公司主要經營併網和離網系統。

sentences.english: This furnace is used at the Anshan Iron and Steel Co. as demonstration furnace.
sentences.chinese: 該爐在鞍鋼弓長嶺球團廠獲得成功應用併成爲示範爐。

sentences.english: With sulfur hexafluoride gas to double as insulation interrupter and circuit breaker.
sentences.chinese: 以六氟化硫氣體進行滅弧併兼作絕緣用的斷路器。

sentences.english: He showed great bravery in saving th drowning child and he succeeded.
sentences.chinese: 他展現了他非凡的勇敢併成功的救起了男孩。

sentences.english: It offers Unity within you, and connects you with the Source of All That Is Divine.
sentences.chinese: 它爲你提供內在統一併使你與所有神聖的源頭相連接。

sentences.english: To select and remove from a group of items those which meet specific criteria.
sentences.chinese: 從一組項中選擇併除去符合某些特定準則的各項。

sentences.english: The proposed method was demonstrated for the determination of chromium species in wastewaters.
sentences.chinese: 併成功用於實際廢水中不同形態鉻離子組份的測定。

sentences.english: The Heat didn't do that with anyone, except maybe Mario Chalmers.
sentences.chinese: 熱火併沒有鍛鍊任何人，查爾默斯也許能算個例外。

sentences.english: Beware of too much laughter, for it deadens the mind and produces oblivion.
sentences.chinese: 要小心太多的笑聲，因它鈍化我們的心靈併產生健忘。

sentences.english: The actual market has long been abandoned impeach solar photovoltaic power station roof and network approach.
sentences.chinese: 市場實際早已抨棄了太陽能光伏屋頂併網電站的方式。

sentences.english: So we have sufficient reason to carry forward and further develop it in perpetuity.
sentences.chinese: 我們有理由永遠把它繼承併發揚光大。

sentences.english: At present, our company mainly engaged in grid and off-grid system.
sentences.chinese: 今朝我公司主要經營併網和離網系統。

definition: to act with self-restraint/to examine oneself/to perform a self-test
then/at once/always/(archaic) luggage rack on a chariot
unable to move freely/difficult to get about
to lose one's job/unemployment/not to fulfill one's obligations/to neglect one's job/dereliction of duty
in turn/successively/one after the other/bit by bit
